trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the recipient of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" /> is the XML Web service, the XML Web service client, or both.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" /> 的收件者是否為 XML Web Service、XML Web Service 用戶端或兩者都是。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> can be applied to either an XML Web service method or a method of a proxy class to an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>可以套用至 XML Web 服務方法或 XML Web 服務 proxy 類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: In either case, the recipient(s) are specified by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情況下，所指定的收件者<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: To specify that an XML Web service method returns a SOAP header when an exception is thrown during its execution, apply an <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> to the method and set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> property to Fault.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定 XML Web 服務方法會傳回 SOAP 標頭，在其執行期間擲回例外狀況時，套用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>至方法，並將<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A>錯誤的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Version 1.0 of the .NET Framework does not support the Fault value.

The following XML Web service method specifies that the `myHeader`<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderDirection.Fault> is sent from the XML Web service client to the XML Web service and then back to the XML Web service client, regardless of an exception thrown during execution of the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 下列 XML Web service 方法指定`myHeader`<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderDirection.Fault>從 XML Web 服務用戶端傳送至 XML Web service，然後回 XML Web 服務用戶端，不論發生的例外狀況時執行 XML Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" /> is sent to the XML Web service client when an exception is thrown by the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 指定 XML Web Service 方法擲回例外狀況時，將 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" /> 傳送至 XML Web Service 用戶端。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" /> is sent to the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" /> 要傳送至 XML Web Service。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" /> is sent to both the XML Web service and the XML Web service client.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" /> 要傳送至 XML Web Service 和 XML Web Service 用戶端兩處。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" /> is sent to the XML Web service client.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" /> 要傳送至 XML Web Service 用戶端。
